verses.verse: A false <S%H4820><s%> balance <S%H3976><s%> is abomination <S%H8441><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: but a just <S%H8003><s%> weight <S%H68><s%> is his delight <S%H7522><s%>.
When pride <S%H2087><s%> comes <S%H935><s%>, then comes <S%H935><s%> shame <S%H7036><s%>: but with the lowly <S%H6800><s%> is wisdom <S%H2451><s%>.
The integrity <S%H8538><s%> of the upright <S%H3477><s%> shall guide <S%H5148><s%> them <S%H5558><s%>: but the perverseness of transgressors <S%H898><s%> shall destroy them <S%H7703><s%>.
Riches <S%H1952><s%> profit <S%H3276><s%> not in the day <S%H3117><s%> of wrath <S%H5678><s%>: but righteousness <S%H6666><s%> delivers <S%H5337><s%> from death <S%H4194><s%>.

The righteousness <S%H6666><s%> of the perfect <S%H8549><s%> shall direct <S%H3474><s%> his way <S%H1870><s%>: but the wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> by his own wickedness <S%H7564><s%>.
The righteousness <S%H6666><s%> of the upright <S%H3477><s%> shall deliver <S%H5337><s%> them <S%H898><s%>: but transgressors shall be taken <S%H3920><s%> in their own naughtiness <S%H1942><s%>.
When a wicked <S%H7563><s%> man <S%H120><s%> dies <S%H4194><s%>, his expectation <S%H8615><s%> shall perish <S%H6><s%>: and the hope <S%H8431><s%> of unjust <S%H205><s%> men perishes <S%H6><s%>.
The righteous <S%H6662><s%> is delivered out <S%H2502><s%> of trouble <S%H6869><s%>, and the wicked <S%H7563><s%> comes in his place <S%H935><s%>.
An hypocrite <S%H2611><s%> with his mouth <S%H6310><s%> destroys <S%H7843><s%> his neighbor <S%H7453><s%>: but through knowledge <S%H1847><s%> shall the just <S%H6662><s%> be delivered <S%H2502><s%>.

When it goes well <S%H2898><s%> with the righteous <S%H6662><s%>, the city <S%H7151><s%> rejoices <S%H5970><s%>: and when the wicked <S%H7563><s%> perish <S%H6><s%>, there are shouts of joy <S%H7440><s%>.
By the blessing <S%H1293><s%> of the upright <S%H3477><s%> the city <S%H7176><s%> is exalted <S%H7311><s%>: but it is overthrown <S%H2040><s%> by the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%>.
He that is void <S%H2638><s%> of wisdom <S%H3820><s%> despises <S%H936><s%> his neighbor <S%H7453><s%>: but a man <S%H376><s%> of understanding <S%H8394><s%> holds his peace <S%H2790><s%>.
A talebearer <S%H1980><s%> reveals <S%H1540><s%> secrets <S%H5475><s%>: but he that is of a faithful <S%H539><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> conceals <S%H3680><s%> the matter <S%H1697><s%>.
Where no counsel <S%H8458><s%> is <S%H5971><s%>, the people fall <S%H5307><s%>: but in the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of counselors <S%H3289><s%> there is safety <S%H8668><s%>.
He that is collateral <S%H6148><s%> for a stranger <S%H2114><s%> shall smart <S%H7321><s%> for it <S%H8130><s%>: and he that refuses collateral <S%H8628><s%> is secure <S%H982><s%>.
A gracious <S%H2580><s%> woman <S%H802><s%> retains <S%H8551><s%> honor <S%H3519><s%>: and strong <S%H6184><s%> men retain <S%H8551><s%> riches <S%H6239><s%>.
The merciful <S%H2617><s%> man <S%H376><s%> does good <S%H1580><s%> to his own soul <S%H5315><s%>: but he that is cruel <S%H394><s%> troubles <S%H5916><s%> his own flesh <S%H7607><s%>.

The wicked <S%H7563><s%> works <S%H6213><s%> a deceitful <S%H8267><s%> work <S%H6468><s%>: but to him that sows <S%H2232><s%> righteousness <S%H6666><s%> there shall be a sure <S%H571><s%> reward <S%H7938><s%>.
As righteousness <S%H6666><s%> tends to life <S%H2416><s%>: so he that pursues <S%H7291><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> pursues it to his own death <S%H4194><s%>.

They that are of a perverse <S%H6141><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> are abomination <S%H8441><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: but such as are upright <S%H8549><s%> in their way <S%H1870><s%> are his delight <S%H7522><s%>.

Though hand <S%H3027><s%> join in hand <S%H3027><s%>, the wicked <S%H7451><s%> shall not be unpunished <S%H5352><s%>: but the seed <S%H2233><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall be delivered <S%H4422><s%>.
As a jewel <S%H5141><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> in a swine <S%H2386><s%>'s snout <S%H639><s%>, so is a fair <S%H3303><s%> woman <S%H802><s%> which is without <S%H5493><s%> discretion <S%H2940><s%>.
The desire <S%H8378><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> is only good <S%H2896><s%>: but the expectation <S%H8615><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> is wrath <S%H5678><s%>.
There is <S%H3426><s%> that scatters <S%H6340><s%>, and yet increases <S%H3254><s%>; and there is that withholds <S%H2820><s%> more than is meet <S%H3476><s%>, but it tends to poverty <S%H4270><s%>.
The liberal <S%H1293><s%> soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be made fat <S%H1878><s%>: and he that waters <S%H7301><s%> shall be watered also himself <S%H3384><s%>.

He that withholds <S%H4513><s%> corn <S%H1250><s%>, the people <S%H3816><s%> shall curse <S%H5344><s%> him <S%H1293><s%>: but blessing shall be upon the head <S%H7218><s%> of him that sells it <S%H7666><s%>.
He that diligently seeks <S%H7836><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> procures <S%H1245><s%> favor <S%H7522><s%>: but he that seeks <S%H1875><s%> mischief <S%H7451><s%>, it shall come unto him <S%H935><s%>.
He that trusts <S%H982><s%> in his riches <S%H6239><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%>: but the righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall flourish <S%H6524><s%> as a branch <S%H5929><s%>.

He that troubles <S%H5916><s%> his own house <S%H1004><s%> shall inherit <S%H5157><s%> the wind <S%H7307><s%>: and the fool <S%H191><s%> shall be servant <S%H5650><s%> to the wise <S%H2450><s%> of heart <S%H3820><s%>.
The fruit <S%H6529><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> is a tree <S%H6086><s%> of life <S%H2416><s%>; and he that wins <S%H3947><s%> souls <S%H5315><s%> is wise <S%H2450><s%>.
Behold <S%H6662><s%>, the righteous shall be recompensed <S%H7999><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%>: much more the wicked <S%H7563><s%> and the sinner <S%H2398><s%>.
